name: Christmas Run! Angry Santa's Revenge! FREE
name_original: Christmas Run! Angry Santa's Revenge! FREE
description:
HELP ANGRY SANTA GET REVENGE ON THE NAUGHTY LIST!

Santa is ANGRY! He's a little sick of delivering presents to ungrateful so-and-sos, and has decided to enforce his Naughty or Nice list to the extreme!

Help Angry Santa get some Christmas Revenge by delivering presents to the nice kids, and bomb the naughty houses into Christmas cheer oblivion! Ho Ho Ho!

Deliver naughty and nice, along with different coloured presents and more. But remember, you have to reach your quota before sunrise! That's when Angry Santa really begins to twitch...

Features:
- Fabulously fun 3D cartoon style graphics.
- Easy pick up and play controls, simply touch where you want Santa to fly his sleigh, and tap the buttons to drop deliveries!
- Addictively simple gameplay, that gets progressively harder and more complicated the further you get.
- Original versions of your favourite Christmas music.
- GameCenter leaderboards and achievements.

It's fun, addictive, and full of crazy, Christmas cheer! Play it!
